issue.title: [CF 913] debuff setup question
issue.body:
I am trying to setup an icon that tracks the debuff's put on a tank from a boss. I use a focus on a tank. Nothing i try seems to show up. Hard to test outside of a raid. Any help would be nice.

comments.body:
I haven't actually imported this to take a look at it properly, but just by reading it here I can tell that all your conditions have the "only check mine' setting enabled. Since these debuff are cast by bosses, these conditions will never pass.

On a related note, there is no reason to use conditions here when you could just use the stack min/max settings in the main tab of the Icon Editor.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Thanks for responding, i do not have "only check mine" selected but i will try the min - max that never occured to me maybe that will do the trick .


> Posted by CurseForge user mnts

You certainly do have that checked: http://i.imgur.com/QrO6TEL.png

Icon 9's condition is also not checking any spell at all.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
